```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#changing guess_max to 10000 gets rid of all parsing failures
data = read_csv("psam_p47.csv", guess_max = 10000)

#finds variables where every value is the same
all.same = apply(data, 2, function(a) length(unique(a))==1)
cols.all.same = data[all.same] #6 cols have all the same value
```
